description: This file contains utility functions for managing session state, user interactions, and knowledge base integration within a Streamlit-based web interface for a reasoning agent system called UAgI. It includes functions for initializing session state, adding messages, selecting models/tools/agents, displaying memories, handling file uploads, managing sessions, exporting chat history, and rendering UI components like knowledge widgets and utilities.

methods.name: initialize_session_state
methods.description: Initializes session state variables for UAgI, including 'uagi', 'session_id', and 'messages'.

methods.name: add_message
methods.description: Adds a message to the session state with role, content, optional tool calls, and display flag.

methods.name: selected_model
methods.description: Displays a model selection sidebar and returns the selected model ID.

methods.name: selected_tools
methods.description: Displays a tool selection sidebar and returns the list of selected tools.

methods.name: selected_agents
methods.description: Displays an agent selection sidebar and returns the list of selected agents.

methods.name: show_user_memories
methods.description: Displays user memories in a Streamlit container with options to clear or refresh.

methods.name: example_inputs
methods.description: Provides preset example inputs for user interaction via sidebar buttons.

methods.name: about_agno
methods.description: Displays information about the Agno library in the sidebar.

methods.name: display_tool_calls
methods.description: Displays tool call results in expandable sections within a Streamlit container.

methods.name: knowledge_widget
methods.description: Manages adding URLs and documents to the knowledge base, and deleting knowledge.

methods.name: session_selector
methods.description: Allows selecting and managing agent sessions, with options to rename sessions.

methods.name: export_chat_history
methods.description: Exports the chat history as a markdown formatted string.

methods.name: utilities_widget
methods.description: Provides utility functions like starting a new chat and exporting chat history.

methods.name: restart_uagi
methods.description: Resets the UAgI session state and triggers a rerun.
